commentaries.commentary: Unbelievable scenes here! Zlatan Ibrahimović, shirt off, celebrating with his teammates after an absolutely stunning goal! What a way to put Sweden up 4-2 in the dying moments against England!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: Absolutely incredible! To attempt that from 30 yards, a bicycle kick over Joe Hart! Pure genius from Zlatan Ibrahimović! You just don't see goals like this! Unbelievable!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: And here's another look! The ball comes in, Zlatan Ibrahimović connects perfectly! It arches beautifully over Joe Hart, right into the top corner.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: Oh, what a chance! Player 9 was right there, a scramble in front of goal! The ball just trickled past the post. Unbelievable!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: He just couldn't quite connect! Player 1 had it covered though, brilliant positioning. That was incredibly close to an opening goal!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2
